summary: This document is an email chain from September 2021 regarding the completion of a 'photo sourcing project' for trial preparation. It includes an attached spreadsheet with evidence item IDs, CD names, and location information, and originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Follow-up on photo sourcing project
events.description: An email is sent checking on the status of the photo sourcing project and requesting the spreadsheet.

events.title: Completion of photo sourcing project
events.description: An email is sent stating the photo sourcing project is completed, with an attached spreadsheet containing evidence item IDs, CD names, and location information.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated September 2021 concerning trial preparation.
A 'photo sourcing project' is completed, resulting in a spreadsheet with evidence item IDs, CD names, and location info.
The correspondence originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The document suggests ongoing legal activity or evidence organization related to the Epstein case in late 2021.
